body: Though I haven't been around this server that long to judge its gamemodes, It seems that control the hill is practically dead. Nobody plays it, and it seems it's just a waste of space. Anybody agree?
body_tagged: Though I haven't been around this server that long to judge its gamemodes, It seems that control the hill is practically dead. Nobody plays it, and it seems it's just a waste of space. Anybody agree?
title: Control the hill seems dead

replies.body: We all love it, and want to play it, but once a gamemode is put in the corner, it's hard to get it back out. The problem is, nobody will start it, but when they do, everyone joins.
replies.body_tagged: We all love it, and want to play it, but once a gamemode is put in the corner, it's hard to get it back out. The problem is, nobody will start it, but when they do, everyone joins.

replies.body: It will have better luck in nise update.
replies.body_tagged: It will have better luck in nise update.

reply_to.body: It will have better luck in nise update.
reply_to.body_tagged: It will have better luck in nise update.

replies.body: It's really good I find the problem is that the game play is the same so I only play for about a hour or so . Unlike nebula the gameplay changes and the monuments are in different places and sometimes there are more and less !

replies.body: Control the Hill doesn't have monuments. And also, there are different maps, just like Nebula.

replies.body: The reason why it is so quiet is because no-one really wants to try start a game, then wait for others to join. It should be fixed in the Nise update though! ;D
